info.description: DAB statistics test page for GEOSS Portal
info.title: DAB statistics test page for GEOSS Portal

parameters.name: statistic
parameters.description: The required statistic. The following statistics 'mostPopularResources', 'mostPopularCatalogs', 'mostPopularOrg' are applied to all the catalogs, so they are available only when the 'catalog' parameter is left blank. The other statistics  are always available, both when the 'catalog' parameter is set and when it's left blank

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Predefined analyzed period. If the period is set, the parameters 'periodRangeStart' and 'periodRangeEnd' must be left blank

parameters.name: periodRangeStart
parameters.description: Start of analyzed period. If the period is set, the parameter 'period' must be left blank

parameters.name: periodRangeEnd
parameters.description: End of analyzed period. This optional parameter can be set only if also the 'periodRangeStart' is set

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Interval of the statistics results. Useful only if the selected statistic is 'numberOfSearches', for all other statistics this parameter can be left blank (otherwise is ignored)

parameters.name: intervalSize
parameters.description: Size of the interval expressed by the the 'interval' parameter. Useful only if the selected statistic is 'numberOfSearches', for all other statistics this parameter can be left blank (otherwise is ignored)

parameters.name: catalog
parameters.description: A catalog target of a selected statistic. May be omitted to target all catalogs

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of presented results, ignored for the 'numberOfSearches' statistic
